metadata.Title: CVE-2014-9899 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: drivers/usb/host/ehci-msm2.c in the Qualcomm components in Android before2016-08-05 on Nexus 5 devices omits certain minimum calculations beforecopying data, which allows attackers to obtain sensitive information via acrafted application, aka Android internal bug 28803909 and Qualcomminternal bug CR547910.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
